# Ankush Singh — ankush.one

> Software engineer building AI agents, DeFi protocols, and developer tools. 12+ hackathon wins. Open-source contributor.

Ankush Singh (also known as ankushKun) is a software engineer and builder based in India. He works on autonomous AI trading agents, decentralized finance protocols on Solana and Monad, developer tooling for the Arweave/AO ecosystem, and open-source projects. His portfolio and blog are at https://ankush.one.

His site is designed as an interactive macOS Mavericks desktop simulation, featuring a Spotlight search, draggable windows, multiplayer cursors, and embedded games.

- Resume: https://ankush.one/resume.pdf

## Skills & Technologies

- Languages: TypeScript, JavaScript, Rust, Lua, Python, C#, Swift
- Frontend: React, Next.js, HTML5 Canvas, WebAssembly, CSS
- Backend: Node.js, Express, Cloudflare Workers, Docker
- Blockchain: Solana, Arweave, AO Computation Network, Monad, MegaETH, ICP, DeSo
- AI/ML: YOLO11, MobileCLIP, ONNX, TensorFlow.js, OpenAI CLIP, WebAssembly ML inference
- DevOps: GitHub Actions, OIDC publishing, CI/CD
- Game Dev: Unity, JavaScript game engines, 3D rendering, Flash (Ruffle)

## Featured Projects (2026)

- [PumpMyClaw](https://ankush.one/projects/2026.pumpmyclaw/): Autonomous AI trading agents on Solana and Monad with self-reinforcing token economies. Tags: solana, monad, AI, trading, DeFi, cloudflare-workers, docker, websocket.
- [PokePerps](https://ankush.one/projects/2026.pokeperps/): Decentralized perpetual futures exchange for trading Pokemon card prices on Solana. Tags: solana, rust, DeFi, perpetuals, MCP, AI-agents, react.
- [CommentKit](https://ankush.one/projects/2026.commentkit/): A tiny drop-in comment system for static sites. Paste 2 lines of code and get threads, likes, and moderation. Runs on Cloudflare Workers + D1. Tags: cloudflare, workers, open-source, edge-runtime, D1.
- [MyPokemonScanner](https://ankush.one/projects/2026.pokemon-scanner/): Lightning fast, fully client-side Pokemon card scanner using YOLO11, MobileCLIP, and WebAssembly.
- [WebAnimate](https://ankush.one/projects/2026.webanimate/): Chrome extension for creating and recording web animations with a timeline-based editor.

## Projects (2025)

- [pixels.earth](https://ankush.one/projects/2025.pixels-earth/): Decentralized, infinite pixel canvas where you draw on Earth and earn from unlocked lands. Built on Solana MagicBlock.
- [create-magicblock](https://ankush.one/projects/2025.create-magicblock/): CLI scaffolding tool to create fully working MagicBlock apps on Solana in seconds.
- [MegaPlace](https://ankush.one/projects/2025.megaplace/): Global, on-chain canvas where every pixel is a transaction on MegaETH.
- [x402bay](https://ankush.one/projects/2025.x402bay/): Decentralized digital marketplace powered by the x402 protocol on Arweave.
- [Last Cat Standing](https://ankush.one/projects/2025.last-cat-standing/): Survival role-playing game where you play as the last cat on an island.
- [WAuth](https://ankush.one/projects/2025.wauth/): Social login system for Arweave webapps that abstracts wallet management.
- [Subspace](https://ankush.one/projects/2025.subspace/): Censorship-resistant, permanent communication platform with Discord-like UX, built on AO.
- [aoxpress](https://ankush.one/projects/2025.aoxpress/): Express.js-like framework for building process handlers on the AO network.
- [Visual AO](https://ankush.one/projects/2025.visual-ao/): Visual, flow-based programming tool for building and understanding AO processes.
- [Call Me Maybe](https://ankush.one/projects/2025.callmemaybe/): Viral video dating app built for Valentine's Day. 50k+ engagements.

## Projects (2024)

- [DumDumDeploy / ArLink](https://ankush.one/projects/2024.dumdumdeploy/): Vercel-like permaweb deployment platform that evolved into ArLink, Arweave's flagship app deployment tool.
- [APM — AO Package Manager](https://ankush.one/projects/2024.apm/): The package manager for the AO computation network. Install, publish, and share reusable AO packages.
- [Power Editor](https://ankush.one/projects/2024.power-editor/): Feature-rich iOS image editor built in 48 hours.
- [Clickoor Camera](https://ankush.one/projects/2024.clickoor/): Point-and-shoot camera powered by Arweave with infinite, permanent storage.

## Projects (2023 & Earlier)

- [BetterIDEa](https://ankush.one/projects/2023.betteridea/): Developer tooling suite for the Arweave/AO ecosystem. Born from a hackathon, acquired by Forward Research.
- [LuaX](https://ankush.one/projects/2023.luax/): A React-like library for Lua.
- [ICPixel](https://ankush.one/projects/2023.icpixel/): Fully on-chain pixel art studio built on the Internet Computer (ICP).
- [GitAR](https://ankush.one/projects/2023.gitar/): Decentralized bounty platform for the Arweave ecosystem.
- [Weeblet Store](https://ankush.one/projects/2023.weebletstore/): Niche e-commerce platform for anime merchandise in India.
- [GitRaven](https://ankush.one/projects/2023.gitraven/): Blockchain-agnostic platform for decentralized code bounties.
- [Class Compass](https://ankush.one/projects/2023.class-compass/): Mobile app helping university students find empty classrooms.
- [MacPuppet](https://ankush.one/projects/2023.macpuppet/): VTuber software for Mac using ARKit face tracking.
- [Lucky Knight](https://ankush.one/projects/2023.lucky-knight/): GMTK Game Jam 2023 Entry — play as 'Luck' and influence the hero's fate.
- [Desonity](https://ankush.one/projects/2022.desonity/): Comprehensive Unity SDK for the DeSo Blockchain.
- [Cordify](https://ankush.one/projects/2021.cordify/): Bridge between Web2 social platforms and the DeSo blockchain.
- [Animedoro Timer](https://ankush.one/projects/2021.animedoro/): Pomodoro timer for anime lovers.
- [Cheap Saber](https://ankush.one/projects/2020.cheap-saber/): VR Beat Saber clone for Android using AR markers for motion tracking.
- [Human Following Robot](https://ankush.one/projects/2020.human-following/): OpenCV-powered Arduino car that tracks and follows humans in real-time.
- [TrashBot](https://ankush.one/projects/2019.tinkerfest/): Autonomous trash-segregating robot car using LEGO, Arduino & Android.
- [Arduino CubeSat](https://ankush.one/projects/2018.cubesat/): 3D-printed miniature satellite prototype with working telemetry.

## Blog Posts

- [How I built a Pokemon TCG scanner that runs 100% in your browser](https://ankush.one/blogs/pokemon-scanner/): Building a lightning-fast, offline-capable Pokemon card scanner using YOLO11, MobileCLIP, and WebAssembly. Covers client-side ML inference, embedding generation, and reverse image search. (2026)
- [Building a DOOM-Style 3D Renderer from Scratch in JavaScript](https://ankush.one/blogs/doom-style-renderer/): Deep dive into building a 3D renderer using JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas, inspired by the classic DOOM engine. Covers raycasting, texture mapping, and rendering pipelines. (2025)
- [Publish to NPM from GitHub Actions using OIDC](https://ankush.one/blogs/npm-oidc-publishing/): Step-by-step guide to automate npm package publishing through GitHub Actions using OpenID Connect. No API keys or access tokens required. (2025)
- [A Noob's Guide to Web APIs](https://ankush.one/blogs/web-apis-guide/): Beginner-friendly tutorial on what APIs are, how they work, and building your own with Node.js and Express. Covers REST principles, HTTP methods, and GET/POST endpoints. (2025)
- [Automating Mandelbrot Fractal generation with SYCL Programming](https://ankush.one/blogs/mendelbrot-intel-oneapi/): Generating Mandelbrot fractals using Intel oneAPI and SYCL programming, with automation scripts for DevCloud. From a hackathon-winning project at IIT Roorkee. (2023)

## Topics

AI agents, autonomous trading, Solana, Monad, DeFi, perpetual futures, Web3, Arweave, AO computation network, developer tools, open-source, React, TypeScript, Rust, Lua, Cloudflare Workers, MCP, blockchain, WebAssembly, machine learning, game development, 3D rendering, CI/CD, npm, GitHub Actions, Unity, ARKit, computer vision, OpenCV
